description: Enterprise techniques used by Dridex, ATT&CK software S0384 v1.0
name: Dridex (S0384)

techniques.comment: Dridex contains a backconnect module for tunneling network traffic through a victim's computer. Infected computers become part of a P2P botnet that can relay C2 traffic to other infected peers.
Dridex can perform browser attacks via web injects to steal information such as credentials, certificates, and cookies.
Dridex contains a module for VNC.
Dridex has used HTTPS for C2 communications.
Dridex has encrypted traffic with RSA and RC4.
